profile:
The Home of Satisfied Customers!

Flooring Liquidators is your one stop , full package solution when it comes to flooring. With our expanding retail locations, large purchasing power and connections with local and foreign flooring manufacturers, we are able to offer our customers top quality flooring at the most competitive prices.

The Largest Flooring Selection

Flooring Liquidators carries a wide array of Canadian and Exotic flooring products. We’ve earned a high reputation with our products and services, and we’ve been the go-to retail store for many homeowners, contractors, realtors, designers, and builders.

Our tagline is ‘Everything is on Sale’ because of our affordable prices. We offer no compromise on our flooring products, since everything is backed by a manufacturer’s warranty to offer you peace of mind.

Visit one of our Showrooms Near you!

Flooring Liquidators currently has 13 showrooms and is rapidly expanding with the aim of becoming a dominant force in the flooring industry. Our service areas are all of the GTA, Toronto, Brampton, Hamilton, Oshawa, Mississauga, Newmarket, Barrie, London, and Ottawa. Contact us now for a location near you.

profile: TepAL Construction is a professional, respectful and committed company. Weather you have a specific design in mind and want to remodel your home, bathroom, kitchen, basement, apartment, office or commercial space we have the skills and our 10+ years of experience to turn those ideas into reality. We specialize in any type of flooring (ceramic, porcelain, engineered flooring, hardwood, vinyl, laminate, carpet tile etc.) drywall & painting.  Email us now for a free quote at tepalconstruction@outlook.com.

profile: We are a full service flooring business ready to work with you.  Interior Floor & Wall Covering Ltd. is a locally owned and operated business since 1989.  We are qualified professionals and specialize in supplying and installing engineered and solid hardwood, luxury vinyl tile and plank, ceramic tile, laminate flooring, carpet and sheet vinyl.  We built the business on achieving above average levels of customer satisfaction.  Interior Floor & Wall Covering has the experience and the skilled technicians to satisfy all types of residential restorations and commercial projects.  We invite customers to visit our showroom which has a full line of products on display for all your flooring needs, with qualified personnel to assist you with your selections.  Let our 30+ experience in the flooring industry work for you.
products: Hardwood, Engineered hardwood, ceramic tile, vinyl plank & tile, carpet, laminate and sheet vinyl, all flooring accessories
services: Supply and install all flooring (and wall tile), in-home consultations, floor repairs
